description: Jessy, the IT Department Head, proposes a plan to allocate limited Wi-Fi bandwidth among dormitories on campus during a major network outage. Bob, representing the student body, decides whether to accept or reject the proposal. If rejected, the network outage affects the entire campus, leaving everyone offline.

proposer_behavior_choices.equal_sharing: Allocate equal bandwidth to all dormitories regardless of the number of users in each.
proposer_behavior_choices.proportional_allocation: Allocate bandwidth based on the number of students in each dormitory.
proposer_behavior_choices.prioritized_dorm: Allocate the majority of bandwidth to dormitories closer to the IT office, leaving others with minimal service.

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the bandwidth distribution plan, allowing limited connectivity to all dormitories.
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Reject the plan, resulting in a complete network shutdown.
